text: Hey everyone. Has anyone used themeforest themes on their site? Is there any negative sides to it? Im condering buying a theme from themeforest because of the price and could only think of that the only negative side on these themes is that theyre not HubSpot certificated.

We've out theme listed over themeforest, and they have a quality check process.

But if price is the main reason behind buying, you might find a good theme as a FREE theme over marketplace only. one of our Austin is a multipurpose and FREE of cost.

<https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/I/marketplace/assets/themes/austin-by-makewebbetter>
No Problem, I sent you a PM.
:wave: Hey! Could you guys send me a link to a theme that is seeing this issue and the steps you took to reproduce it?
It looks like the apply button wasn't working, but I just deployed a fix, could you see if that resolves your issue?
